short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provide trust score from checkdot.io for supported tokens on coinmarketcap.com and coingecko.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Displays a confidence score provided by the CheckDot api to give an idea of risk on each project listed in cmc / cg.

Complementary tool to your own analysis.
